ing: 1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®)
des: "This spread has a wonderful flavor as well as great color for Christmas time or any time of year. It can be served hot or cold with crackers. Everyone requests this recipe."
ins: Combine cream cheese, cranberry sauce, feta cheese, almonds, green onions, orange pepper, and creamy salad dressing in a bowl.
